comments.text_preview: 50 cent base pay raise, 80 cent for 3+ year aas
Lubbock Texas here. We got a .50 raise.
What is T3 pay in NC ? I’m a T3 in NY
The raise would put me over $23. Honestly would be nicer if my site had an overnight differential but we don’t so overnight shift is always shafted
You'll get ot pay after 40 hours or regular work, but you don't get holiday pay or vacation, but you get unlimited pto cause you don't earn vacation from what I've heard from others.

I'm gonna be making $22.90/hr with this raise, even as a white badge. Being converted with be nice for that extra 50 cents, though. And I absolutely need dental insurance sooner than later. But I'll h...

50¢ raise is an extra $1000 per year. How much is rent increasing? Groceries?
